llm-tools/embedJs

Node.js framework for RAG applications

View on index

Related repos

  • Open-source RAG engine for document understanding and LLM integration
  • toolkit for evaluating and optimizing LLM and RAG apps
  • JavaScript playground app to write and run code with instant feedback using Node.js andbrowser APIs
  • run local LLMs in JavaScript or TypeScript
  • browser extension to copy webpages as clean Markdown for LLMs
  • Chat with websites using local embeddings
  • Converts webpages to LLM-friendly text
  • lightweight LLM framework for code and agents
  • Micro web server for Node.js
  • framework for building LLM and RAG apps with pipelines
